title: Bir Mucize Olsun
overview: Growing up in the muddy streets of Cukurdere, Damla takes a life like a servant, not a adoption, beside Maksude who raised her. A day in the midst of misery and despair, a young lawyer named Yigit knocks her doors. Damla, who does not know who her real parents are, tells her that he is one of the richest of country's richest people, Azim Sancaktar.
